page.title: 11TEDDINGTON SWIMMING POOL
page.content: A lot of children in this area use Teddington Swimming Pool. It is also used by local schools. It is a very clean and tidy indoor pool, in fact there are two pools, a big pool and a learners pool. The staff are very strict about who goes in the learners pool and who goes in the deep end of the big pool.There is no bombing, pushing or summersaults allowed. There is a men's and a ladies' changing room with lockers. When you put ten pence in the locker you can turn the key (which has a band around it) to lock the locker.You get the ten pence back afterwards. The only thing I dont like about the pool is that the cafe is very expensive. STANLEY SCHOOL
